name: Rapid (itch) (Mike_)
description:
Rapid

This game is a dev-demo for the AGDG Demo Day 10

Rapid is a multiplayer racing game with a simple goal: Get to the finish line as fast as you can.

This demo is single player only though (the net code isn't all done yet).

Just download the file, unzip it somewhere and you are good to go.

Controls: WSAD to move, spacebar to jump.

There are 3 tracks which you can complete in the game.

Thank you for trying this demo out.
